About Dan Kelley

Dan is a Professor of Oceanography at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada. In addition to this blog, some information about him and his work can be found at the following links.

  1. Github repositories
  2. ResearchGate list of scientific publications
  3. website at Dalhousie University
  4. google-scholar site
  5. Dan has a blog at WordPress, and is also experimenting with github blogging as indicated below. (Readers interested in github blogging might find the source code for the blog of some use, but should be warned that it is still rough around the edges, and that it may go away if it proves bothersome to use, compared with wordpress.)
